# Configure billing accounts layout

Learn how to configure the billing accounts layout by adding fields and adjusting settings in the Related List Properties Dialog.

To configure the Billing Accounts layout:

1.  In the Billing Accounts area, click the wrench icon to open the Related List Properties Dialog. ![Billing Account Page Layout](https://zuora.deploy.heretto.com/v4/deployments/QPAZk6lsgXwvotedNERE/object/c9cb0b93-d41d-4074-b9e0-e45cd6ce2cdd?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..QODO5uCBS1oGhNlYAi1pcYAegFQfa63F6VhEs_SCRrI)
2.  Select the following fields in the Available Fields list, then click the right ( Add ) arrow to add them to the Selected Fields list. This adds the fields to the Billing Accounts layout. ![Related List Property](https://zuora.deploy.heretto.com/v4/deployments/QPAZk6lsgXwvotedNERE/object/205e5234-12fb-4b9c-bdcf-682d985b6fc3?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..v3ACPGcRIhgGOMilW8kO466H9llRtzeYI3JiyNf1o90)

    -   Bill to Account Balance

    -   Last Invoiced

    -   AutoPay

    -   Status

    -   Payment Term

    -   Credit Card Expiration

    -   Credit Card Number

    -   Credit Card Type


3.  On the Buttons heading, click the + sign.
4.  Uncheck New .
5.  Click OK to save your changes.
